question: Who is the present CEO of UIDAI?
explanation: Dr. Ajay Bhushan Pandey is the Chief Executive Officer(CEO) of Unique Identification Authority of India UIDAI and has been steering Aadhaar in India since its beginning in 2010.He is an officer of Indian Administrative Service having over 30 years of experience at various positions in Government of India. He has closely worked with central and state governments, banks, oil companies and other stakeholders to enable use of Aadhaar platform in programs such as Direct Benefit Transfers, financial inclusion, and E-governance.
